description: RANNTA is a living memorial and symbolic cryptocurrency created as a tribute to the Los Angeles fire — representing resilience, rebuilding, and collective rebirth. It stands at the intersection of mythology, finance, and technology, serving as the foundation for symbolic finance and decentralized creation within the RANNTAverse.

airdrops.description: Community holders receive 1,500 RANNTA each as an appreciation airdrop to support organic ecosystem growth.

tokenomics.admin_privileges: Revoked — all minting and admin rights are publicly verifiable on-chain.

liquidity.purpose: Ensure fair price discovery, transparent trading, and staking opportunities for all participants.

bridge_link.name: NexusBridge (FunC Legacy)
bridge_link.role: Synchronization between TON Field Layer and RANNTA Meta-Layer

integration.ecosystem: RANNTAverse — NFT, symbolic art, and conscious finance on TON

team.overview: RANNTA is developed by an international team of creators and researchers from Oman, Canada, and Germany — blending mythology, economics, and computer science into a unified symbolic financial protocol.

vision.core_message: RANNTA is more than a coin — it is a living ritual and an invitation to collective creation.
values: Integration of art, finance, and consciousness

note: This manifest defines the official parameters and verified data for the RANNTA COIN deployed on the TON blockchain.
